posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

pages.title: Tianyu Guo (郭天宇)
pages.text: E-mail : guoty9[at]mail2.sysu.edu.cn Resume Education Experience year university degree 2018 - 2022 Xidian University B.S. 2022 - now Sun Yat-Sen University Master Personal Web CSDN Github Leetcode Experience Teaching Assistant of “SYSU-DCS3013 : Computer Architecture” [2022f] release SYSU-ARCH LAB Research Bachelor’s dissertation “General Computing optimization for GPU based on Cache management” AI final Homework “A Convolutional Neural Network Frameworksupport on CPU and GPU”
